name: heybe-extension
description: Heybe Browser Extension - Cross-browser shopping list management

scripts.build:firefox: npx extension build --browser=firefox && npm run fix:firefox-manifest
scripts.build:safari: npx extension build --browser=safari && npm run fix:safari-manifest
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:safari
scripts.fix:firefox-manifest: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const manifest={manifest_version:2,version:'1.0.0',name:'Heybe Extension',description:'Farklı sitelerdeki ürünleri Heybe\'de topla.',icons:{'48':'icons/logo.png'},permissions:['activeTab','storage','<all_urls>'],browser_specific_settings:{gecko:{id:'tum-listem@extension.js',strict_min_version:'55.0'}},content_scripts:[{matches:['<all_urls>'],js:['content_scripts/content-0.js'],run_at:'document_idle',css:[]}],background:{scripts:['background/service_worker.js'],persistent:false},browser_action:{default_title:'Heybe Extension',default_icon:'icons/logo.png'},web_accessible_resources:['images/*']};fs.writeFileSync('dist/firefox/manifest.json',JSON.stringify(manifest,null,2))"
scripts.fix:safari-manifest: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const manifest={manifest_version:2,version:'1.0.0',name:'Heybe Extension',description:'Farklı sitelerdeki ürünleri Heybe\'de topla.',icons:{'48':'icons/logo.png'},permissions:['activeTab','storage','<all_urls>'],content_scripts:[{matches:['<all_urls>'],js:['content_scripts/content-0.js'],run_at:'document_idle',css:[]}],background:{scripts:['background/service_worker.js'],persistent:false},browser_action:{default_title:'Heybe Extension',default_icon:'icons/logo.png'},web_accessible_resources:['images/*']};fs.writeFileSync('dist/safari/manifest.json',JSON.stringify(manifest,null,2))"
